enhanced_by.reason: addClass(String) should be invoked before removeClass(String) to ensure the class is present before removal.
hasClass(String) can be used to validate if the class is present before attempting to remove it.
hasClass(String) can be used to verify that the class has been successfully removed after invoking removeClass(String).
outerHtml() can be used to compare the HTML structure before and after the class removal to ensure the change is as expected.
